strength_details: Strong modern data stack with Azure Cloud Data Platform, DataBricks, and Spark Framework
Established enterprise company (IBM) with global consulting opportunities
Exposure to multiple Azure services and cloud-native technologies
Clear data engineering focus with streaming and batch processing experience
concern_details: No salary, compensation, or benefits information provided
Unclear role scope due to consulting nature - varies by client project
No work-life balance, PTO, or company culture information
Limited growth opportunities or career path mentioned
best_fit_details: Senior data engineers with 4+ years in Big Data technologies seeking Azure/cloud focus
Engineers with Spark/Python/Scala expertise wanting consulting exposure
Professionals seeking stable enterprise environment with modern tech stack
probe_details: Ask about compensation, benefits, and total package details
Understand team structure and reporting within delivery center
Clarify how client projects are assigned and managed
Discuss work hours, overtime expectations, and client deadline pressures
Explore career progression and skill development opportunities
leverage_details: Strong Azure and Spark combination is valuable in consulting market
Streaming pipeline experience with Kafka is specialized skill
summary.overall_assessment: Solid enterprise data engineering role with modern tech stack at established company. Good for professionals seeking Azure/Spark expertise and consulting exposure. Main concerns are lack of compensation transparency and unclear role scope due to consulting nature. Strong technical foundation but limited growth/culture information provided.
